name: SlimeFlight
description:
A game of action where you will have to relax and reach the major quantity of points.

You can play with 10 characters where only have to "Marco" a cute green slime that does not care about anything.

To unlock the other characters have to collect 30, 60 and 80 points in 3 difficulties.

*Easy

*Normal

*Hard

Besides unlock characters, also it has an achievement system where you can get your medals if you can get to the points that are desired.

Test your skills and try to reach 100 points in the 3 difficulties.

Good luck and start a new game.

General characteristics:

✔ 10 characters (9 to unlock).

✔ 3 difficulties with their own scenarios.

✔ 24 achievements to unlock.
